name: sampler
description: Generates quasi-probabilities by sampling quantum circuits.

circuits.description: A single or list of QuantumCircuits.

circuit_indices.description: Indices of the circuits to evaluate.

parameter_values.description: A list of concrete parameters to be bound for each circuit. If specified, it must have the same length as circuit_indices.

run_options.description: A collection of key-value pairs identifying the execution options, such as shots.

quasi_dists.description: List of quasi-probabilities returned for each circuit.
